markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Coating](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1865)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Extradimensional" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=67" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 32 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When etched, this rune creates an extradimensional space that links to the weapon that wields it. The space can hold up to 1 Bulk but can contain only [poisons](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-poisons) and [magic oils](/equipment/consumables/oils) that could be applied to the weapon. Stowing or retrieving an item in the space requires an Interact action, except when using the rune's activation.

<document level="2" id="action-1563" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Coating
